faqs.question: How can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your registered email.

faqs.question: How do I check my grades?
faqs.answer: Go to the 'Academics' section in the student portal, then click 'Grades' to view your results.

faqs.question: How do I pay my tuition fees?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the 'Finance' tab and select 'Fee Payment'. You can pay using a debit card, credit card, or net banking.

faqs.question: Who do I contact for technical support?
faqs.answer: You can contact technical support at support@yourportal.com or call +123456789.

faqs.question: How can I update my profile details?
faqs.answer: Go to the 'Profile' section and click 'Edit' to update your details. Save your changes once done.
